mapper.select: select id, tenant_id, user_id, ip_addr, country, province, city, county, login_time, login_result, login_result_code,isp from back_user_login_record where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into back_user_login_record(tenant_id, user_id, ip_addr, country, province, city, county, login_time, login_result, login_result_code,isp) values (#{tenantId}, #{userId}, #{ipAddr}, #{country}, #{province}, #{city}, #{county}, #{loginTime}, #{loginResult}, #{loginResultCode},#{isp})

insert into back_user_login_record(tenant_id, user_id, ip_addr, country, province, city, county, login_time, login_result, login_result_code,isp) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.ipAddr}, #{entity.country}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.county}, #{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.loginResult}, #{entity.loginResultCode},#{entity.isp})

insert into back_user_login_record(tenant_id, user_id, ip_addr, country, province, city, county, login_time, login_result, login_result_code,isp) values
(#{entity.tenantId}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.ipAddr}, #{entity.country}, #{entity.province}, #{entity.city}, #{entity.county}, #{entity.loginTime}, #{entity.loginResult}, #{entity.loginResultCode},#{entity.isp})
on duplicate key update tenant_id = values(tenant_id), user_id = values(user_id), ip_addr = values(ip_addr), country = values(country), province = values(province), city = values(city), county = values(county), login_time = values(login_time), login_result = values(login_result), login_result_code = values(login_result_code) isp = values(isp)
mapper.update:
update back_user_login_record
tenant_id = #{tenantId},
user_id = #{userId},
ip_addr = #{ipAddr},
country = #{country},
province = #{province},
city = #{city},
county = #{county},
login_time = #{loginTime},
login_result = #{loginResult},
login_result_code = #{loginResultCode},
isp = #{isp},
where id = #{id}
